name: Wedging
description: Kneading clay to prepare it and remove air pockets.

name: Ball Kneading
description: Kneading the clay with both hands before placing on the wheel.

name: Throw Clay On Wheel
description: Placing prepared clay onto the wheel head.

name: Centering Press
description: Placing both hands on the wheel to stabilize the clay.

name: Thumb Opening
description: Using thumbs to press downward into the center of the clay to open it.

name: Rib Shaping Out
description: Using rib tool to shape the outside wall.

name: Smoothing
description: Refining surfaces by running fingers or tools across clay.

name: Sponge Refinement
description: Sponge held at rim or wall while wheel spins.
